body:
I've switched this over to using straight up React components. I don't _love_ this implementation, mostly because we have to duplicate values in a few places. Ant's `Menu` components apparently rely on React's `key` prop to determine what submenu/item is open/selected. Attempting to abstract out our own `NavItem` for example causes React to mess with `key`s, which ultimately breaks that functionality. As a result, I've had to drop a bunch of nested components into the main `render` function.

@rehandalal Check this out and let me know if it closer matches your vision.
